attributes.action: ensure that women have good access to support services for perinatal mental health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women do not have full access to help and support when suffering mental health problems during pregnancy. This can be severe and need support of professionals. There are often poor resources and lack of support for the professionals trying to achieve this. Government must ensure that the health of mothers and new babies is paramount.
